Animation Appreciation: StormJumper

2 Mar, 2014

As a planetary storm approaches, a lone shaman manages to avoid disaster. That’s the description of this incredible short film, animated by Malcolm Sutherland. It’s called ‘StormJumper’. You need to watch it.

(Click here to view on Vimeo)
